name: Inversion (itch) (Lucky Clover Dev)
description:
Origin, a being with no beginning, wakes up on a small planet with no knowledge of what they are or what their purpose is. Help them explore the mysteries of this newly born universe and discover all that there is to see!


- Collect Items -
Talk to various characters and collect all items to unlock secrets!


- Controls -

- Credits -
Music: Chan Mrotzek
Everything else: Lucky Clover Dev
